txt.en:
The vile sorcery of the Nazg√ªl has been let loose on the inhabitants of Minas Tirith. Fell spirits have risen from the dead of Sauron's armies, and now fell beasts circle ever closer the battle.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Battle-weary soldiers defended
* Fell spirits defeated
* Fell beast driven off
Defend soldiers of Minas Tirith from fell spirits and the Enemy's fell beast
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the hornblowers to alert reinforcements.</rgb>
You should defeat the fell spirits threatening the remaining warriors of Gondor, and drive off the Enemy's vile fell beasts.
